column3:
A happy ray is a productive ray, as Zukin well knows.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Feed the striped ray at krill swarms by using its Inhale ability.

Fancy going for a little swim, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>? If you have a moment to spare, Makura could use your help with the rays. They look after us, and so we must look after them.
Ah, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>, I've been waiting for you. I need you to take one of our rays out for a good feed─a reward for all of its toils.
Now, the fellow loves few things more than krill, and you'll find swarms of them close by. Please have him feed till he's had his fill.
Should you become separated from the ray, worry not─he is trained to return here. Happy feeding, then, and let Zukin know when you're done!
The ray sucks in a copious amount of seawater and krill.
The ray sucks in a copious amount of seawater and krill.
The ray sucks in a copious amount of seawater and krill.
There you are! The ray returned without you, and he's been champing at the bit to get back to his krill.
There is a large swarm of krill. You make a mental note of the spot for feeding the ray.
Welcome back, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I understand you treated the ray to a veritable banquet. This will doubtless do wonders for its spirit.
Makura tells me the creature is very fond of you, and who could blame it? When next it needs a good feed, I trust we can rely on you again.
Our little ray returned with a belly full of krill and a grin from gill to gill! Thank you so much, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>!
